Rag.Description: Retrieve the most relevant document snippets for the user's question and return context passages for answering.

ChartBuilder.Description:
Return a chart configuration based on the provided data.

Usage:
1. Specify chartType (bar/line/area/pie).
2. data is an array of query result rows.
3. If you are unsure about xKey / yKeys / categoryKey / valueKey, leave them empty and the tool will infer:
   - Line/area: prefer a time field for x, numeric fields for y.
   - Bar: prefer a category field for x, numeric fields for y.
   - Pie: choose one category field as categoryKey and one numeric field as valueKey.
4. The tool infers time/numeric/category columns and sets options.xKeyType/sortBy when appropriate.

SqlRunner.Description:
A tool to execute read-only SQL queries on ClickHouse / data warehouses.
Usage:
- Only accepts a single SELECT / SHOW / DESCRIBE / DESC / EXPLAIN statement; no INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE.
- For questions about queries, aggregations, reports, or metrics, generate SQL first, call this tool, then answer from results.
- If schema is unclear, call DESCRIBE or SHOW to explore first.
SqlRunner.MissingConnection: Missing database connection info; unable to execute query.
SqlRunner.ReadOnlyOnly: Only read-only queries are allowed (SELECT/SHOW/DESCRIBE/EXPLAIN). Do not include write or update statements.

Suggestions.Healthy: The table looks healthy overall; no special optimizations needed.
Suggestions.Default: Consider further optimization based on workload patterns.

Issues.PartitionTooFew: Too few partitions for a large table; limited partition pruning
Issues.PartitionTooMany: Too many partitions may add metadata overhead
Issues.PartitionSkewed: Severe partition skew; one partition holds most data
Issues.PartsTooMany: Too many parts; consider merging small files
Issues.PartsTooManyCritical: Extremely high part count may hurt queries and merges
Issues.PartsManySmallTable: Small table has unusually many parts; possible frequent small writes
Issues.PartsFewLargeTable: Large table has few parts; merges look healthy
Issues.PartSizeTooSmall: Average part size is too small; many small files
Issues.PartSizeTooLarge: Very large part detected; may affect merges and performance
Issues.PartFragmented: Part sizes are uneven; fragmentation risk
Issues.TtlMissing: Large table without TTL may accumulate historical data
Issues.TooManyActiveMutations: Many active mutations may impact cluster resources

Details.RowCountMissing: rowCount missing or cannot be parsed
